pageContent:
Dhana D 
  
PROFESSIONAL SUMMARY 
 
With over 7+ years of experience, worked as a full stack developer and gained expertise in various aspects of the software 
development life cycle including requirements  gathering, analysis, design, development, testing, and deployment of Java 
and J2EE object-oriented technologies for client/server-based applications. 
• Proficiency  in  utilizing Waterfall,  Agile,  and  Scrum  methodologies throughout  the Software  Development  Life 
Cycle (SDLC), including requirement specification, documentation of software architecture and design specifications, 
Java implementation, mentoring, and delivering architecture presentations to a diverse set of stakeholders. 
• Working  knowledge  of front-end  technologies utilized  in  developing  user  interactive  (UI)  web  pages,  including 
HTML5, CSS, JSON, JSTL, Bootstrap, JavaScript, NodeJS, jQuery, GraphQL, and AJAX.

HTML5, CSS, JSON, JSTL, Bootstrap, JavaScript, NodeJS, jQuery, GraphQL, and AJAX. 
• Experience in developing enterprise-level MERN Stack applications, by writing server-side code using Node.js and 
Express framework, utilizing MongoDB database to store and retrieve data, and designing the front-end using React. 
• Experienced in ReactJS utilizing both React Flux and Redux architecture, implemented complex OOP concepts to 
enhance  website  performance  by using ReactJS  components,  Forms,  Events,  Keys,  Router,  Redux,  Animations, 
and Flux concept and have good understanding of state store, middleware, action creator, reducer, and container. 
• Hands-on experience in utilizing Angular to construct Single Page Applications, and possess a strong comprehension 
of creating custom directives, services, components, and routing in Angular. 
• Experienced working  with  Object-Oriented  Programming  (OOP) design  patterns,  including Singleton,  Abstract

of creating custom directives, services, components, and routing in Angular. 
• Experienced working  with  Object-Oriented  Programming  (OOP) design  patterns,  including Singleton,  Abstract 
Factory, Factory Method, Prototype, Builder, and Dependency Injection, in Angular. 
• Skilled in utilizing various UI testing frameworks for web applications, like Karma, Jasmine, Enzyme, Protractor 
(for AngularJS), Mocha, Jest, Chai (for ReactJS and BackboneJS), and Spock (for testing backend services). 
• Good understanding of EMAC Script, mainly ES5 and ES 6, and JavaScript trans-compiler Typescript. Experienced 
in utilizing advanced JavaScript concepts like Closures, Promises, Prototype, map, reduce, filter, and async/await. 
• Skilled in implementing Java/J2EE design Patterns including command, object pool, singleton, session facade, 
Data Transfer Object (DAO), Model View Controller (MVC), and Data Access Object (DAO).

• Skilled in implementing Java/J2EE design Patterns including command, object pool, singleton, session facade, 
Data Transfer Object (DAO), Model View Controller (MVC), and Data Access Object (DAO). 
• Experience in Java EE technologies, including Servlets, Java Server Pages (JSP), JSTL, Web Services (SOAP and 
REST), JDBC, Java Server Faces (JSF), Java Message Service (JMS), JNDI, and Java Mail. 
• Practical experience in Core Java and possesses a thorough comprehension and working knowledge of Object-Oriented 
Programming as well as APIs such as Collections, Java beans, Multi-Threading, and Exception. 
• Good understanding of Core Java SE 8 concepts such as Exception Handling, Functional Interfaces, Streams API, 
Time API, Multithreading, Transaction Management, Lambda functions, Generics, and Collection API. 
• Strong understanding of prevalent API technologies like Spring Boot and Microservices and proficient in developing

• Strong understanding of prevalent API technologies like Spring Boot and Microservices and proficient in developing 
back-end functionalities using microservices that are utilized by web applications designed with Angular. 
• Experience in utilizing AngularJS to consume RESTful web services that provide data in XML and JSON formats. 
• Extensive knowledge of Microservices architecture and has experience in implementing various design patterns and 
designed and developed RESTful Web services utilizing Spring Rest and JAX-RS. 
• Employed Microservice architecture approach in  combination with Spring  Boot based  services and  established 
communication between services achieved through a combination of REST and Apache Kafka message brokers. 
• Proficient working with RESTful Web Services and have expertise in implementing RESTful APIs. as well as have  
• Participated in the development of SOAP web services utilizing WSDL, JAXB, CXF, AXIS, JAX-WS and developed

• Participated in the development of SOAP web services utilizing WSDL, JAXB, CXF, AXIS, JAX-WS and developed 
Restful web services using JAX-RS, CXF and JERSEY APIs as well as created using AXIS/Rest API. 
• Worked  on  multiple  modules  of  the Spring Framework,  such  as Spring  Web  Flow,  Spring  Core,  Spring  MVC, 
Spring ORM, Spring JDBC, Spring Security and Spring Cloud. Also proficient in implementing the Inversion of 
Control (IoC) and Dependency Injection (DI) concepts of the Spring Application Framework. 
• Employed Spring Boot Actuator to supervise and regulate the application in the production environment. 
• Good  Knowledge  on  working  with OAUTH2.0 to  provide  authentication  and  authorization  to Rest  services by 
exchanging Access tokens and used JSON Web Tokens (JWT) to securely communicate JSON Objects. 
• Expert in developing Enterprise Java Beans (EJB) and Message Driven Beans (MDB) components and proficient in

• Expert in developing Enterprise Java Beans (EJB) and Message Driven Beans (MDB) components and proficient in 
utilizing MQ channels like IBM  MQ,  Rabbit  MQ,  Active  MQ and Kafka for  asynchronous communications  and 
implemented Java Messaging Service (JMS) for dependable information exchange across Java applications.

• Experience  in  working  with NoSQL-based ORM frameworks  such  as Mongoose  Connector and Cassandra  Node 
Driver and  have  a  strong  foundation  in RDBMS databases  such  as Oracle,  SQL  Server and MySQL, as  well  as 
NoSQL databases such as MongoDB and Redis and possess excellent skills in writing SQL queries. 
• Efficient in deploying applications using IBM WebSphere, WebLogic App Server, JBoss and Tomcat Webserver. 
• Proficient working  with  testing  tools  such  as Postman,  TestNG,  Jest, Enzyme  and  Apache  JMeter in  addition  to 
utilizing debugging tools like ESLint, Redux DevTools and Chrome Developer Tools. 
• Experienced in Test Driven Development using JUnit and Mockito, developed SOAP and RESTful Web Services 
with SOAP UI and Postman and worked on Apache Camel, Docker, Swagger, Liquibase script, and Lombok. 
• Hands-on  experience  in  utilizing various build  tools  such  as Gruntjs,  Gulp  Server and Yeoman as  task  runners  to

• Hands-on  experience  in  utilizing various build  tools  such  as Gruntjs,  Gulp  Server and Yeoman as  task  runners  to 
carry  out repetitive  tasks  such  as Minification,  compilation and Unit  testing. Experienced  in  integration  and 
deployment of applications using ANT, Maven, Gradle, Jenkins & debugging through log4j and Splunk. 
• Automation Testing of web-based applications and services with proficiency in Java, REST API, Selenium WebDriver. 
• Highly  skilled  in  utilizing version  control  systems specifically GIT, Subversion  (SVN), GitLab,  GitHub and 
Bitbucket which were employed for executing tasks such as branching, tagging, merging.  
• Experience in using Git and SVN for version control, tracking bugs and issues with Jira, and implementing Continuous 
Integration and Continuous Deployment (CI/CD) through tools such as Jenkins, Argo CD and GitHub Actions.

Integration and Continuous Deployment (CI/CD) through tools such as Jenkins, Argo CD and GitHub Actions.  
• Experienced in Docker, and  deployed microservices  on Docker Containers and utilized Docker and Kubernetes as 
runtime environments for development, testing, and deployment and implemented container-based deployments.  
• Hands-on   experience   on   various AWS   Cloud   services like EC2,   Route53,   EBS,   Auto   Scaling,   VPC, 
CloudFormation,  S3,  RDS, Amazon  Elastic  Load  Balancing, IAM,  Cloud  Watch and  other  services  of  the AWS 
infrastructure like Dynamo DB, SQS and EMR focusing on high-availability, fault tolerance and auto-scaling. 
• Experience  in Object  Oriented  Design and  Implementation,  as  well  as  working  with  the Microsoft  Azure  cloud 
product suite, including Service Bus, Event Hub, Azure Function, Azure Blob Storage and Azure Cosmos DB.

product suite, including Service Bus, Event Hub, Azure Function, Azure Blob Storage and Azure Cosmos DB. 
• Hands-on experience and a deep understanding of the GCP environment with a particular focus on using Google Big 
Query, Google Pub/sub, Google Spanner, Dataflow, Compute Engine, and Google Storage. 
• Experience  in  using JIRA, Version-One for  bug  tracking  in  project  level and integrated  several JIRA plugins like 
JIRA client, JIRA importer plugin, JIRA charting plugin, Microsoft Project connector, and JIRA custom field.

MARSH MCLENNAN, Baltimore, MD                                                                                          June 2022 - Present 
 
Role: Sr Full Stack Developer 
Marsh McLennan is a multinational company that provides professional services in insurance brokerage. As a part of Mercer 
team my  work  involves  designing,  developing,  and  maintaining  complex  Java  applications,  collaborating  with  cross-
functional teams, and ensuring high-quality code while working on both the front-end and back-end technologies.  
• Worked in all stages  of the software development life cycle, including requirement gathering, design, development, 
testing, deployment, and maintenance, using the Scrum methodology in an Agile environment. 
• Develop presentation  layer  with JSPs,  HTML5,  JavaScript,  CSS3,  Bootstrap,  jQuery,  JSON,  AJAX,  Angular, 
Spring Form tags, JSTL Tags and Coded standards complaint HTML5 and CSS3.

• Develop presentation  layer  with JSPs,  HTML5,  JavaScript,  CSS3,  Bootstrap,  jQuery,  JSON,  AJAX,  Angular, 
Spring Form tags, JSTL Tags and Coded standards complaint HTML5 and CSS3.  
• Implemented Angular  directives, expressions,  routing  capabilities for bookmarking,  filters,  validations and 
Angular UI components, Components, ng-Modules, Providers, Services and classes for navigation. 
• Maintain  and  customize JavaScript (and ActionScript)  frameworks  to  tailor  applications  to  suit  client needs and 
worked on the JavaScript library that simplifies HTML document traversing, and event handling. 
• Applied  core Java technologies,  such  as  Object-Oriented  Programming (OOP) concepts, Collections, String 
handling, Multithreading, and searching algorithms, to enhance system performance. 
• Involved  in  working  on  Object-Oriented  analysis  and  design,  with J2EE design  patterns  including Singleton,

• Involved  in  working  on  Object-Oriented  analysis  and  design,  with J2EE design  patterns  including Singleton, 
Prototype, Session Facade, Data Transfer Object (DTO) and Business Delegate. 
• Worked on end-to-end testing using Grunt automation and unit testing of JavaScript using Karma, Jasmine tools. 
• Used Java concepts  like Collections,  Exception  handling,  Concurrency to  develop  business  logic.  Worked  with 
J2EE and J2SE technologies including JSP's, Servlets, Java Web Start, EJB’s and Web logic. 
• Extensively  used Java 8 features lambda  expressions,  Parallel  operations on collections,  multithreading and  for 
effective sorting mechanisms, worked on Java 8 with Cold Fusion. Used Streams and Lambda expressions available 
in Java 8 to store and process the data and used Collections Lists, Sets, and Maps and advance core Java principles. 
• Developed Microservice that  uses Spring  Boot to  provide Restful  API and  utilized  various  data  persistence

• Developed Microservice that  uses Spring  Boot to  provide Restful  API and  utilized  various  data  persistence 
frameworks such as Hibernate and JPA as well as messaging engines. Implemented Persistent Logic using Java JPA 
along with Spring hibernate JPA and easily get access to data using features such as Stored Procedures. 
• Implemented SOA (Service Oriented Architecture) for developing Spring Restful/Microservices along with Spring 
Eureka and Netflix as part of service discovery using Apache Axis and Spring Ribbon for load balancing. 
• Consumed  and  created SOA services  like Soap and Restful Web  Services  and  tested  using SOAP  UI and  used  the 
features of Spring Core layer (IOC), Spring AOP and Spring JDBC in order to develop the application. 
• Designed  and  implemented  an  application  using Spring  Boot,  Spring  IOC, Spring  transactions, Dependency 
Injection, Spring Annotations, Spring AOP, Spring Actuator, Spring Container managed transactions.

Injection, Spring Annotations, Spring AOP, Spring Actuator, Spring Container managed transactions. 
• Implemented  the  associated  business  modules  integration  using spring and Hibernate data  mapping and utilized 
Spring Boot, Cloud, Spring Data using CURD repository, Spring Batch, Spring Kafka modules. 
• Implementing RESTful Webservices to retrieve  data from client side and  made RESTAPI  calls from Angular and 
parsed the data to project client and handled the security and authorization using OAuth and JWT. 
• Integrated Spring Security via JWT/OAuth with Auth0, Firebase, Google, Facebook, and Twitter for Social Sign-in. 
• Worked on  the  Security  frameworks  like OAuth  2.0,  JWT token-based authentication, Spring Security  and 
implemented Single Sign-On (SSO) using Site Minder on single/multiple cookie domains for Web applications. 
• Used Apache  Kafka (Message  Queues)  for  reliable  and  asynchronous  exchange  of  important  information  between

• Used Apache  Kafka (Message  Queues)  for  reliable  and  asynchronous  exchange  of  important  information  between 
multiple business applications and involved in developing an automation tool in Java and Scala. 
• Worked on Rest Services to expose these services as webservices with JAX-RS and Jackson Binder serialization for 
JSON format and used Postman to test Rest Service end point. 
• Utilized JUnit, Advanced Rest Client, and Log4j to implement Test Driven Development (TDD) for creating test 
cases and determining the functionality of the application. 
• User-generated  data  is  stored  using  the NOSQL database  management  system Mongo  DB and  knowledge  of  using 
relational databases. Designed and developed several PL/SQL blocks and stored procedures in the DB2 database. 
• Conduct performance testing of Apache and Tomcat management services. Program and prepare code for interfacing

• Conduct performance testing of Apache and Tomcat management services. Program and prepare code for interfacing 
with Apache Tomcat Systems. Performance tuning and deploying of Apache Tomcat applications. 
• Used Gradle for configuring automation of building process for Java application and configured Gradle plugins to 
support tasks such as compiling code, running tests and packaging artifacts. 
• Utilized Git for version control and maintaining both  recent and previous  versions  of files, including web pages  and 
source code and used GitHub for source configuration management (version control).

• Work with the processes and tools related to DevOps and Agile operations such as Code review, unit test automation, 
Build & Release automation, Environment, Service, Incident and Change Management. 
• Used Jenkins and pipelines to  drive  all microservices builds  out  to  the Docker registry  and  then  deployed  to 
Kubernetes, created Pods and managed  using Kubernetes. Configured  and  managed Kubernetes networking  and 
service discovery using tools as Istio, Linkerd, or Flannel resulting in improved network performance and security. 
• Developed Docker files and Docker Compose files to manage the build and deployment of containerized applications 
across multiple environments, such as Development, Testing and Production. 
• Created and  managed Jenkins jobs  to  automate  build,  test,  and  deployment  processes  for  various  projects and 
integrating Jenkins with DevOps tools like Git, Docker and Kubernetes to facilitate seamless software delivery.

integrating Jenkins with DevOps tools like Git, Docker and Kubernetes to facilitate seamless software delivery. 
• Implemented the Hibernate framework (object relational mapping) to interact with the database. 
• Developed AWS cloud formation  templates  and  setting  up  Auto  scaling  for EC2 instances  and  involved  in  the 
automated  provisioning  of AWS cloud environment  using Jenkins and Chef and  managed  servers  on  the Amazon 
Web Services (AWS) platform instances using Chef configuration management. 
• Aware of troubleshooting issues on AWS, Netflix Eureka and other developer IDE and Cloud environments. 
• Involved in deployment of systems using EC2, S3, RDS, SQS, and Cloud Formation services from AWS Infrastructure. 
• Worked  on  services  provided  by  the Google  Cloud  Platform (GCP)  including  the compute  engine,  cloud  load 
balancing, cloud storage, cloud SQL, stack driver monitoring, and cloud deployment manager.

balancing, cloud storage, cloud SQL, stack driver monitoring, and cloud deployment manager. 
• Used Jira to  generate  dynamic  dashboards  and  reports  that  provide  real-time  insights  on project  status,  team 
performance, and key metrics such as velocity, burndown, and cycle time. 
Environment: HTML5, CSS3, Bootstrap, JavaScript, Angular, Spring MVC, Spring Boot, Typescript, Bootstrap, 
Microservices, Jasmine, Karma, Mocha, JSON, JWT, OAUTH, Apache Kafka, RabbitMQ, PostgreSQL, Selenium, 
Postman, Junit, Mockito, Power Mock, Maven, Gradle, Log4J, GIT, Apache Tomcat, Jenkins, AWS, AJAX, JSP. 
 
 
KENDRA SCOTT, Austin, TX.                                                                                                    Jan 2022 – June 2022 
 
Role: Full Stack Java Developer 
Kendra Scott is a well-known brand in the fashion accessories industry that specializes in designing and producing jewelry

Role: Full Stack Java Developer 
Kendra Scott is a well-known brand in the fashion accessories industry that specializes in designing and producing jewelry 
for women.  As  a Full Stack Java Developer, my responsibilities  included updating and  maintaining  web services  for the 
applications and supporting new data-driven capabilities to enhance our iconic customer experience. 
• Provided strategic direction on handling of all phases of the Software Development Life Cycle including requirement 
gathering,  designing,  and  estimating  project  timelines,  used agile  methodologies  such  as SCRUM to  develop  the 
application, following the Agile process to complete the user stories scheduled for the sprint release. 
• Developed web-based GUI’s using various technologies such as JSP, HTML, DHTML, CSS, JavaScript (including 
JSON framework), Action Script, DOJO, Node JS, ReactJS, jQuery, EXT JS, and Ajax.

• Developed web-based GUI’s using various technologies such as JSP, HTML, DHTML, CSS, JavaScript (including 
JSON framework), Action Script, DOJO, Node JS, ReactJS, jQuery, EXT JS, and Ajax. 
• Worked  on  responsive  design  and  developed  a  single ISOMORPHIC responsive  website that could  be  served  to 
desktop, Tablets and mobile users using React JS. 
• Developed User Interface (UI) with Redux, forms  and  material UI for more interactive web pages  and developed 
the Front-End and UI of ARWorks applications using JavaScript, ES6, React and Redux.  
• Worked  with JavaScript events, functions and JavaScript  objects,  prototypes,  closures,  callback  functions and 
promise, also with Object-Oriented JavaScript such as Backbone.js, Knockout.js, Ember.js, Handlebars.js. 
• Developed Servlets and Java Server Pages (JSP) to route the submittals to the EJB components and render-retrieved 
information using Session Facade, Service Locator, DOA, DTO (J2EE Design patterns).

information using Session Facade, Service Locator, DOA, DTO (J2EE Design patterns). 
• Analyzed and designed a scalable system based on OOP, OOAD and various J2EE design patterns and used software 
engineering design patterns and REST to achieve an efficient communication between applications. 
• Worked  with  unit  testing  of JavaScript front-end  logic using Karma,  Jasmine,  API  mocker,  Jest, enzyme and 
debugging applications in different browsers using Firebug, and testing applications using QUnit. 
• Develop the primary components for the backend using Java 8 restful web services, using Elassandra, a combination 
of Elasticsearch and Cassandra for persistence and transforming XML and JSON inputs. 
• Used Java8's Stream API for executing bulk data operations on Collections. Designed applications using both Java7 
and Java8, utilizing features such as lambdas, streams, multi-threading and the Executor Service framework.

and Java8, utilizing features such as lambdas, streams, multi-threading and the Executor Service framework. 
• Implemented and utilized modern microservices frameworks and tools such as Spring Boot, Node.js and Micronaut 
to build and deploy microservices, resulting in improved development productivity and faster time-to-market.

• Involved  in processing  of JSON data  retrieved  from  a RESTful web  service,  utilizing Axios to  access  database 
resources and populate the User Interface (UI). Middleware was facilitated by Redux-Saga. 
• Used Axios to fetch the data by consuming the Rest API and build REST web service by building Node.js Server in 
the back end to handle requests sent from the front-end jQuery Ajax calls. 
• The Redux-Thunk middleware  was  used  with  the Redux store  to  retrieve  contract  data  via  a RESTful  API 
implemented on the backend in Node.js and MongoDB and consuming the SOAP web services exposed by pay metric 
(third  party  vendor)  for  credit  card  transactions  using JAX-WS and worked  with NPM commands  and  using 
package.json for managing dependencies and dev-dependencies of Node.js applications. 
• Used Spring Core Annotations for Dependency Injection Spring DI and Spring MVC for REST API’s and Spring

package.json for managing dependencies and dev-dependencies of Node.js applications. 
• Used Spring Core Annotations for Dependency Injection Spring DI and Spring MVC for REST API’s and Spring 
Boot for micro-services and utilized Spring Data JPA to be utilized newer ways to query the databases. 
• Developed application  using  the Spring framework, utilizing its features such  as Spring  Dependency  Injection, 
Spring Web Flow with Spring MVC and Spring Boot, all within the IntelliJ IDEA development environment. 
• Used Object/Relational mapping software Persistence of objects in database tables with Hibernate. 
• Created business  reports  through  the  development  of Node-based services,  utilizing Express  JS as  middleware. 
Secured APIs by  employing OAuth  2.0 with JWT token  mechanism,  while  authentication/authorization  for  the 
application was developed using multiple NPM node modules including regex and JWT Web Token.

application was developed using multiple NPM node modules including regex and JWT Web Token. 
• Used ActiveMQ messaging to set up communication between applications in ESB and flows are created for JAX-WS 
and JAX-RS web services. Developed Restful Microservices deployed on AWS servers using EBS and EC2.  
• Created robust RESTful web service using Apache CXF and automated documentation for the web services within the 
application is provided by Swagger by configuring hapi-swaggered and hapi-swaggered-ui. 
• Conducted unit  testing,  integration  testing and system  testing of backend  APIs utilizing Java based  testing 
frameworks such as JUnit, TestNG to ensure quality and correctness of the code. 
• Developed  and  maintained Maven-based  projects  to  manage dependencies,  build  artifacts, and generate  reports. 
Configured Maven plugins to automate tasks such as compiling code, running tests.

Configured Maven plugins to automate tasks such as compiling code, running tests. 
• Worked  on Git  Bitbucket,  GIT responsibilities  include  maintaining  the  version  control  system  (branching  model, 
security), creation and maintenance of build definitions\scripts, and the setup of work item areas and iterations. 
• Involved in the  creation,  improvement,  and  automation  of  the  build  and  deployment  process for  every  release and 
backup, restore and upgrade. Expertise in using Chef for cloud automation and working with DevOps platforms. 
• Automated the deployment of Docker containers using Continuous Integration and Continuous Delivery (CI/CD) 
pipelines, such as Jenkins which helped in faster release cycles and improved quality assurance. 
• Developed  and  updated Kubernetes manifests  and Helm charts  to  specify  and  implement Kubernetes components 
such as Services, Pods, Deployments, and ConfigMaps and responsible for maintaining the resources.

such as Services, Pods, Deployments, and ConfigMaps and responsible for maintaining the resources. 
• Created SQL queries and stored procedures that use joins to retrieve data from various tables in remote databases. 
• Optimized database performance by analyzing query execution plans and implementing appropriate indexing strategies 
and designed and implemented NoSQL databases using MongoDB and Cassandra. 
• Created queries  and  performing CRUD  operations in NoSQL  databases and gained experience in  tasks such  as 
database migration, data conversion and data synchronization between SQL and NoSQL databases. 
• Worked with Web/Application servers such as Apache Tomcat, Jboss, Oracle WebLogic Servers and WebSphere 
AS. Created war files and deployed them on Tomcat using the ANT deployment tool. 
• Worked with services offered by the Google Cloud Platform (GCP) including compute engine, cloud load balancing,

AS. Created war files and deployed them on Tomcat using the ANT deployment tool. 
• Worked with services offered by the Google Cloud Platform (GCP) including compute engine, cloud load balancing, 
cloud storage, cloud SQL, stack driver monitoring and cloud deployment manager. 
• Developed  the  framework  to  use  the  web  services  hosted  in  Compute  Engine  instances  of GCP  (Google  Cloud 
Platform) and experience in setting up instances and working with BigQuery on the Google Cloud Platform. 
• Worked  on Microsoft  Azure  Cloud services  such  as Azure  Storage/Cosmos  DB/Azure  Service-Bus and  familiar 
with Azure services including Compute, Azure Websites, Caching, SQL Azure NoSQL, Network services, Azure 
Active Directory, API Management, Auto Scaling, Scheduling, Storage and PowerShell Automation.  
• Developed custom Jira plugins and integrations using Jira APIs and scripting, resulting in significant time savings 
and improved data accuracy.

• Developed custom Jira plugins and integrations using Jira APIs and scripting, resulting in significant time savings 
and improved data accuracy. 
Environment:  Java  8,  HTML5,  CSS3,  JavaScript,  React,  NodeJS,  Redux,  NPM,  Jasmine,  Karma,  Microservice, 
Spring  Boot,  MongoDB,  PostgreSQL,  Angular,  JSON, SOAP,  Hibernate  ORM,  Jenkins,  OAUTH,  JWT,  Kafka, 
Redis, Swagger, Junit, Mockito, Maven, JBOSS, GIT, SVN, GitHub, Docker, AWS.

ELEVANCE HEALTH, Hyderabad.                                                                                             Jan 2020 – Aug 2021 
 
Role:  Java Developer 
Elevance Health, Inc. is an American health insurance provider. As a Java Developer, my responsibilities included updating 
and maintaining web services for the application that provides health benefits to the customers and enhancing capabilities 
for the application to have wonderful customer experience. 
• Created various UI components for different web pages using HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, jQuery, Vaadin framework 
ReactJS. Designed Frontend within object-oriented Java Framework Vaadin. 
• Performed client-side validations using JavaScript and jQuery Framework. 
• Interacted with java controllers JQUERY, Ajax, and JSON to write/read data from back-end systems. 
• Used all aspects of MySQL/PHP Programming (Object Oriented PHP).

• Interacted with java controllers JQUERY, Ajax, and JSON to write/read data from back-end systems. 
• Used all aspects of MySQL/PHP Programming (Object Oriented PHP). 
• Worked on the Spring MVC architecture, which uses the Model-View-Controller design pattern to implement all the 
spring framework's capabilities, such as inversion of control, dependency injection, and aspect-oriented programming. 
• Worked at Integration layer (VIP), worked on Restful services  and used Spring IoC, DI and AOP managing beans 
and cross cutting concerns. 
• Designed, documented (Swagger) and developed Microservices (Admin Service, Reports Service, Audit Service, Loan 
Processing Service) using Java, Spring Boot, Spring, Hibernate, JSON, JWT and MongoDB. 
• Mocha and Chai for testing Node and Enzyme for React application and used JUnit to test the Spring boot application. 
• Involved in developing code to convert a SOAP response into a JSON object and construct a tree in UI.

• Involved in developing code to convert a SOAP response into a JSON object and construct a tree in UI.  
• Used Spring Security to control the  Authentication and  Authorization to access the resources  within the application. 
Implement OAuth2.0 and JWT Tokens. 
• Created Unit tests using Mocha, Sinon, Chai and Enzyme. 
• Developed  Restful  services  using  Spring  Framework  and  handled  access-control  features  like  authentication  and 
authorization by using Spring Security, OAuth 2.0 with JWT. 
• REST API services were tested using the POSTMAN and SOAPUI tools and the Rest client. 
• Written SQL queries, stored procedures modifications, Local Data Base Changes and used Toad for testing environment 
for existing database structure as required per addition of new features. 
Environment: Java5, JDBC, Servlets, JSP, MySQL, HTML, SOAP, Eclipse, WSDL, WebLogic Server, EJB, GIT, 
CSS, Strut.
